content: For release on delivery  11:50 a.m. EDT  April 10, 2019      Progress on the Transition to Risk-Free Rates         Remarks by     Randal K. Quarles     Vice Chair for Supervision     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     and     Chair     Financial Stability Board     at     The Financial Stability Board Roundtable on   Reforming Major Interest Rate Benchmarks     Washington, D.C.    April 10, 2019
